content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am interested in renting out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to get the lowest price, not the highest. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
